DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigational drug study determine much male hormone , testosterone , need maintain sperm production testis .
DOC.detailed_description: This nine-month research study examine effect androgen treatment sperm production healthy men . There three phase study , 2-month screening phase , 4-month treatment 3-month follow-up . In study , investigator aim define quantitative relationship intra-testicular testosterone ( IT-T ) spermatogenesis man . Hormone level measure small amount testicular fluid begin end treatment sperm concentration measure .
DOC.criteria: Males age 1855 In general good health base normal screening evaluation Normal serum testosterone , lutenizing hormone ( LH ) follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) Prostate Specific Antigen ( PSA ) < 3.0 Agrees donate blood participate another research study study Informed consent Must willing use reliable form contraception study Participation longterm male contraceptive study within past three month History testosterone anabolic steroid abuse past History current skin disorder interfere testosterone gel Poor general health significantly abnormal screen blood result History current testicular prostate disease History bleeding disorder need anticoagulation History untreated sleep apnea and/or major psychiatric problem BMI > 32 History current liver disease Chronic pain syndrome Current use terfenidine , astemizole , cisapride , budesonide , felodipine , fluticasone , lovastatin , midazolam , sildenafil , vardenafil Use glucocorticoid underlie adrenal insufficiency Active drug alcohol abuse within past year
